ygData.subject: Re: Surnames
ygData.msgSnippet: I hear that those names are bestowed by a Guide or GM on those who upon reaching their 20th level call for such service.  And just last night I met someone who
ygData.messageBody:
I hear that those names are bestowed by a Guide or GM on those who upon
reaching their 20th level call for such service. And just last night I met
someone who chose not to have a surname (cant believe he could not find a GM
for 13 levels <g>).

Sylly
Bard of the 11th level
HogCallers Inn
Freeport, Innoruuk



-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Stewart [mailto:bstewart@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 11:03 AM
To: EverQuest Bards
Subject: [eqbards] Surnames

From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>

How does one obtain a surname to float magically over one's
head?

Thrush
